程序包 org.janusgraph.core.attribute

接口 AttributeSerializer<V>

类型参数:
V - Type of the attribute associated with the AttributeSerializer
所有已知子接口:
OrderPreservingSerializer<V>
所有已知实现类:
BooleanArraySerializer, BooleanSerializer, ByteArraySerializer, ByteSerializer, CharacterSerializer, CharArraySerializer, DateSerializer, DoubleArraySerializer, DoubleSerializer, DurationSerializer, EnumSerializer, FloatArraySerializer, FloatSerializer, GeoshapeSerializer, InstantSerializer, IntArraySerializer, IntegerSerializer, JsonSerializer, LongArraySerializer, LongSerializer, ObjectSerializer, ParameterArraySerializer, ParameterSerializer, SerializableSerializer, ShortArraySerializer, ShortSerializer, StandardTransactionIdSerializer, StringArraySerializer, StringSerializer, TypeDefinitionDescriptionSerializer, UUIDSerializer
public interface AttributeSerializer<V>
Allows custom serializer definitions for attribute values.

For most data types (i.e. classes) used with properties, using the default serializer when registering the type with the JanusGraph will be sufficient and efficient in practice. However, for certain data types, it can be more efficient to provide custom serializers implementing this interface. Such custom serializers are registered in the configuration file by specifying their path and loaded when the database is initialized. Hence, the serializer must be on the classpath.

When a PropertyKey is defined using a data type specified via PropertyKeyMaker for which a custom serializer is configured, then it will use this custom serializer for persistence operations.

作者:
Matthias Bröcheler (http://www.matthiasb.com)
另请参阅:
RelationTypeMaker, "Datatype and Attribute Serializer Configuration" manual chapter

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    default V convert​(Object value)
    Converts the given (not-null) value to the expected data type V.
    V read​(ScanBuffer buffer)
    Reads an attribute from the given ReadBuffer.
    default void verifyAttribute​(V value)
    Verifies the given (not-null) attribute value is valid.
    void write​(WriteBuffer buffer, V attribute)
    Writes the attribute value to the given WriteBuffer.

  • 方法详细资料

    • read

      V read​(ScanBuffer buffer)
      Reads an attribute from the given ReadBuffer.

      It is expected that this read operation adjusts the position in the ReadBuffer to after the attribute value.

      参数:
      buffer - ReadBuffer to read attribute from
      返回:
      Read attribute

    • write

      void write​(WriteBuffer buffer, V attribute)
      Writes the attribute value to the given WriteBuffer.

      It is expected that this write operation adjusts the position in the WriteBuffer to after the attribute value.

      参数:
      buffer - WriteBuffer to write attribute to
      attribute - Attribute to write to WriteBuffer

    • verifyAttribute

      default void verifyAttribute​(V value)
      Verifies the given (not-null) attribute value is valid. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the value is invalid, otherwise simply returns.
      参数:
      value - to verify

    • convert

      default V convert​(Object value)
      Converts the given (not-null) value to the expected data type V. The given object will NOT be of type V. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if it cannot be converted.
      参数:
      value - to convert
      返回:
      converted to expected data type
